ratings.comment: Ugh this class is such a waste of time. The recorded lectures were so boring and I watched the first few but then just stopped cause its a pretty big waste of time. The resume/cover letter units were pretty much the only helpful parts of this. This class and the internship class could be combined into one and it would save everyone a lot of time.
A lot of homework for a one-credit course , some useful content, but a lot of busy work.

This class is far too easy and monotonous. The online lectures are very boring because she has a very scripted tone while teaching. I did learn some valuable things, but the class could have been condensed by a lot. I spent a lot of time answering unnecessary questions about each module that didn't facilitate any learning.

This class is absolutely terrible. Considering it is a career prep class that is only worth one credit, it is rather unfortunate that many taking the class already have jobs lined up after graduation (including myself). Lots of busy work assigned like making a resume by her specific instructions :(
This is a one credit class and the homework for it is outrageous. I have never had to put so much time into a one credit class and they nit pick on mistakes. Waste of time and I learned nothing

There is sooo much to read/do for this ONE CREDIT CLASS. Even though it is not difficult, there is a lot of tedious work that takes up A LOT of time. This class should be at least two credits. Very picky grader as well. Too bad this is a required class or I would have kicked it to the curb.

Professor Hazen teaches INTER-HE 202 001 online. Though it is only a one credit course, she gives you an overload of homework. The homework is not hard or anything, but she nick-picks on little mistakes. I think with the amount of work we do for this class, this class should be worth at least 2 or 3 credits.
